quotes.quote: I have always thought that if women's hair posed so many problems, God would certainly have made us bald.
When red-headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
Anyone can be confident with a full head of hair. But a confident bald man - there's your diamond in the rough.
Her albino hair illuminated my dreams, shining brighter than moonlight.
Long hair is considered bohemian, which may be why I grew it, but I keep it long because I love the way it feels, part cloak, part fan, part mane, part security blanket.

Relaxing your hair is like being in prison. You're caged in. Your hair rules you. You didn't go running with Curt today because you don't want to sweat out this straightness. You're always battling to make your hair do what it wasn't meant to do.
Hair brings one's self-image into focus; it is vanity's proving ground. Hair is terribly personal, a tangle of mysterious prejudices.

Beauty draws us with a single hair.

I always get bored with my hair. That's why I would always change it throughout my career.

It is not by the gray of the hair that one knows the age of the heart.
For me, hair is an accoutrement. Hair is jewelry. It's an accessory.
I would rather have had one breath of her hair, one kiss from her mouth, one touch of her hand, than eternity without it.
There are times when I flick through magazines and think I'm in danger of becoming a prisoner of my own hair.
Beware of her fair hair, for she excels. All women in the magic of her locks; And when she winds them round a young man's neck, she will not ever set him free again.

I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
Your hair is the ball gown you never take off.

My real hair color is kind of a dark blonde. Now I just have mood hair.
Gentlemen prefer blondes...but gentlemen marry brunettes.
Once in his life, every man is entitled to madly fall in love with a gorgeous redhead.

If you want to get ahead in business, you've got to have serious hair.

When I see the pictures you play in that theater, it makes the hair stand on the edge of my seat.

One hair of a woman can draw more than a hundred pairs of oxen.
Grey hair is a sign of age, not wisdom.
If a woman hath long hair, it is a glory to her.

all humans born had fragile bunches of hair emanating from their scalp, / the same grew into islands inhabited by deceit and lechery, / as advancing years crept, vanquishing immaculate hair of childhood, / into traces of everlasting oblivion.
Oh! little lock of golden hue / In gently waving ringlet curls, / By the dear head on which you grew, / I would not lose you for a world.

Girls and young dancers in ancient Egypt and young girls in ancient Rome also wore their hair in the style that we now call a ponytail.
The hairstyle known as ponytail can be seen on frescoes painted thousands of years ago in Crete, so it may have emerged in Greece during ancient times.
Today, state fairs continue to sponsor hair contests of various kinds. For example, the Michigan State Fair has traditionally held a Longest Ponytail contest.
Men in Europe and the American colonies wore short ponytails during the 1700s, or they wore wigs with a type of ponytail that was called queue.
A ponytail can be neat, simple, and practical, since it keeps the hair off the face during certain jobs, sports, or other activities, and can be more comfortable in hot weather.

The high ponytail is flattering for most face shapes and it's easy to do. When the ponytail is in place on the high crown area. It helps lift the face. This hairstyle is ideal for girls with naturally straight, thick hair and a silky texture.

The half pony is a very casual style and works well for mid-length hair. It's great if your hair is extremely thick because it allows you to wear your hair down but you have most of it pulled back and out of your face.
The low pony is one of those simple classic styles that can be worn in a number of ways from sporty to chic. This look is a great option for girls who have extremely thick hair.
French back pony. This style is perfect for anyone with heavy, limp hair that just won't hold in a ponytail.

Hair styling is a part of hair care. Both require maintenance in a timely fashion.
No doubt as a result of their driving desire for a youthful appearance, the hair color segment of the salon industry continues to grow.
So no matter what the state of the economy and the world we live in, it's till a good time to start a harir salon ad day spa, and the prospects for 'shear' success and excellent.
If you're not a practicing cosmetologist, it's possible to be an absentee owner.
You'll probably want to be in the salon every day anyway, if only to keep an eye on things and make sure everything is running smoothly.
If you're providing salon services, you can expect to spend up to 60 hours a week or more in the salon, depending on your bookings.
The type of work on a health farm is similar to that of a beauty salon, but the hours can be much longer and there is more emphasis on body treatments and weight reduction.
A beauty therapist has the opportunity to develop a close, personal relationship with clients that may go on for many years.
As a beauty therapist, your appearance must be professional at all times.
Movie and video hair stylists are creative forces to be reckoned with.
With individualistic artistic talent, hair stylists mold, shape, cut, and manipulate hair to create images that may linger forever in your memory.
In film, hair stylists are asked to do just about anything and everything.
As a multi-media hair stylist, you'll encounter many situations that require knowledge of facial anatomy, as well as the structure of the hair follicle.
Problems often arise for hair stylists who are just beginning their career, and that's why it's important that professional hair stylists know how to solve unexpected problems quickly.
The earliest record of personal hair care dates back 2.5 million years ago, when brushes used to create cave paintings in Spain and France were adapted for use in hair grooming.
Although hairdressing techniques have evolved throughout the ages, some things have stayed the same.
The first known school for hairdressing in the United States was established in Chicago in 1890.
Many of the innovations in hair design that are still with us today originated in the late 19th century.
On the hair salon side, the most sought-after services are, of course, haircutting and styling.

Hair matter. Pay attention to your hair, because everyone else will.
